JSON

public enum JSON: Equatable, Codable

A JSON value (one of string, number, object, array, true, false, or null).

  • null

    A null value.

    Declaration

    Swift

    case null
  • boolean

    A boolean value.

    Declaration

    Swift

    case boolean(Bool)
  • string

    A string value.

    Declaration

    Swift

    case string(String)
  • int

    A number value, represented as an integer.

    Declaration

    Swift

    case int(Int)
  • double

    A number value, represented as a double.

    Declaration

    Swift

    case double(Double)
  • array

    An array value.

    Declaration

    Swift

    case array([JSON])
  • object

    An object value.

    Declaration

    Swift

    case object([String: JSON])
